about_the_game:
Once you purchase and install/download the Art Book in the DLC list of Hardcore Cruising in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Hardcore Cruising) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the Art Book in this folder.

Our art books include all the art from the game (in a static form) and commentary about the game's creation from the developers.
